title: Patcher 5.20 disappears after 45%
body: Hey guys so all I want to do is play league and I have tried to download it but this happens. Gets past 33% starts 2/2 and gets to about 40% when it finishes downloading and then gets to about 45% applied patches (not applying) and freezes. Sometimes it gets to more but I leave it overnight and when I check it it has disappeared. Try running it and rads error comes up or unspecified error and it won't even open. I have to restart several times to fix then goes back to 33%. I always run as admin my laptop is new tried 3 internet sources reinstalled 50 times get the occasional bug splat but it never downloads. Just eventually disappears. If u need logs plz tell me which ones. Thanks

replies.body:
Hey WaTcHuLoOkNaTm9, 

I read into your issue and after seeing you almost tried everything, it may be best to put your faith in a ticket. I had some issues with connecting and they helped me out. 

New Ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new 

Good luck!  After your fixed up wanna battle by ya in the rift. 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
